Package ta4_1.MoneyFlow_Backend.Users

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
ta4_1.MoneyFlow_Backend.Users.UserController
@RestController public class UserController extends Object
Controller for managing user-related operations in the MoneyFlow application.

  • Method Details

    • getUsersByType

      @GetMapping("/users/type/{userType}") public List<User> getUsersByType(@PathVariable String userType)
      Retrieves a list of users filtered by their type.
      Parameters:
      userType - the type of users to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of users with the specified type

    • getUser

      @GetMapping("/users/id/{id}") public Optional<User> getUser(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Retrieves a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, or an empty Optional otherwise

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/users") public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users.
      Returns:
      a list of all users

    • signup

      @PostMapping("/signup") public UUID signup(@RequestBody User u)
      Handles user signup by creating a new user with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      u - the user to be created
      Returns:
      ID of the User

    • loginGuest

      @PostMapping("/login/type/guest") public UUID loginGuest()
      Handles guest login by creating a new user with the type "guest".
      Returns:
      a success message

    • login

      @PostMapping("/login") public UUID login(@RequestParam String email, @RequestParam String password)
      Handles user login by verifying the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user attempting to log in
      password - the password of the user attempting to log in
      Returns:
      ID of the User
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if the user is not found or the password is incorrect

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/users/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> updateUser(@PathVariable UUID id, @RequestBody User u)
      Updates the information of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to be updated
      u - the updated user information
      Returns:
      Updated user if the update is successful

    • updateIncome

      @PatchMapping("/users/{id}/income") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> updateIncome(@PathVariable UUID id, @RequestBody Map<String,Double> incomeMap)

    • generateFinancialReport

      @GetMapping("/{id}/financial-report") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Double> generateFinancialReport(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Generates a financial report for a user.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user for whom the report is to be generated
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the financial report or a not found status

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/users/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUser(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Deletes a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      a success message
